question: 楽器
sourceMnemonic: Remember how <ja>楽</ja> was used in <ja>音楽</ja> and meant "music"? Well this is that <ja>楽</ja> again. A <kanji>music</kanji> <kanji>container</kanji> is something that can produce music. It is a <vocabulary>musical instrument</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. 

You have already learned the reading for <ja>器</ja> but <ja>楽</ja> uses the secondary reading so you may not have learned it.  However, you learned this reading in the word <ja>音楽</ja>. Just bear in mind that the <ja>がく</ja> shortens to <ja>がっ</ja>.
